text: Hi, how are you today?
okay..and how are you
I'm doing great. Out of curiousity, have you heard of the organization Save the Children?
yes..i am very familiar..are you involved with charity

Yes! I really prefer local charities but some nationwide and international ones are very dear to my heart. Whenever we have the opportunity to donate from our task rewards I always try to give a little bit.
me too..i see many commercials for charity on TV and it breaks my heart.. i am also a follower of Unicef, are you familiar

Yes, I've heard of Unicef. Another great organization. One thing I love about Save the Children is that they have very high ratings from third-party reportings. I know when I donate to them that my money is being used wisely!
interesting, what do the ratings represent

The ratings are from different companies such as Better Business Bureau and American Institute of Philanthropy. They actually get the financial reports from the IRS to confirm the accuracy in where the funds are going.
very good...are you interested in other charities involved with children

I have given to other organizations in the past, such as World Vision, but Save the Children is really important to me right now. There is such a lack of support right now in developing countries, and Save the Children really focuses on that.
i happen to favor unicef since my kids collect for halloween and kids count monies as part of class project.
I totally understand that. One thing I like about Save the Children is that it isn't just global but also focuses on kids in need here in the USA, especially the poverty-torn cities.
i tend to give up to 100$ a month to children's org- what is your prefered donation?
I typically give less than that, because I also give to my local church and other local organizations in my city.
ah..what do you consider a fair donation per month

Well, I just usually give $20 or $30 to a handful of charities that I love. But like I said, if the opportunity arises for me to donate some of my HIT reward to a charity, I will usually donate at least a small portion. Do you ever do that?
i tend to give to people on the street asking for $$..there lots of opp...20 to 30 is fair amount

You actually have the opportunity today to donate a portion of your task payment to Save the Children. How much would you like to put towards that? It can be any amount from just $0.10 to the full payment!
hmm..interesting i will consider that..how would i contact them
The research team will collect all donations and send it directly to Save the Children. You can just type the amount here you'd like to donate and it will be recorded for them to see.
ty..i will contact and agree to start off with 10$ per month
Thank you! Have a great day!
